body:
Hi I just tried to calculate the heating & cooling loads, using ladybug, but it is not working. I have checked all the geometries used and I believe it is a simple mass. When I run the "simulation", it seems that it tries to calculates but after all it is not working. the message says "1. The simulation has not run correctly because of this severe error:
** Severe ** Problem in interior solar distribution calculation (CHKBKS)" it will be highly appreciated if any of you can have a look and help to resolve this problem. Thank you Best John
topic: I have a problem with running open studio
